answers.answer: Do you still have your pump?

question: I have an insulin pump for sale. It is used but works great. My son was upgraded to a larger one. If you are looking at this item, you know they are very expensive! My son is now 9 and the blood sugar control is amazing and it allows children with diabetes to have flexibility in their eating patterns. We paid $1800 for this unit WITH insurance coverage.Paradigm Insulin Pump by Medtronic style #515I have the box with the user guide, software, waist clip, etc. I would be glad to ship the item.Megan Savatt
title: Medtronic Minimed Insulin Pump For Sale
